channel.title: Combat timer....?
channel.description: can someone tell me how to make it so the person cant log out like out of like 10 seconds of combat? u know like real rs like ur fighting and u try and log out and it says "you cannot log out until like 10 seconds after combat" if u know hwta i am talking about please help me.
